events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle your refund case promptly.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the wrong item you received. I'll help you with your refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received for verification?
Sure, my order number is 12345678, and I have attached a clear photo of the incorrect item I got.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and you will receive a confirmation email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and processing the refund. I appreciate your help.
We have completed the refund transaction and you should see the credited amount in your account soon.
Just checking in to confirm your refund was received and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund was confirmed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you!
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience.
